description.value:
Undead are immune to the following effects, unless the effect specifies it works against undead creatures.

  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.v9RNVTqyTyaPchvd]{Bleed}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Death effects}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{Disease}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Mind-affecting effects}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralysis}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poison}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{Sleep}, and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunning}.
  • Ability damage, ability drain, energy drain, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.33ynSbmexuxC3cAQ]{Exhaustion}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.JGFn4MrDZ6X5vrzU]{Fatigue}, negative levels, and nonlethal damage.
  • Any effect that requires a Fortitude save (unless the effect works on objects or is harmless).

Format:Immunities undead immunities.
